featured.text: In 1990, Mitsubishi Electronics was reported to have announced the formation of a team composed entirely of AB workers, thanks to “their ability to make plans.”

definition.zh_def: 三菱，一家日本跨國企業，主要從事汽車、重工業和電子產品的生產。
definition.en_def: Mitsubishi, a Japanese multinational company primarily engaged in the production of automobiles, heavy industry, and electronics.
definition.example: I drove a Mitsubishi car to work today.
